selected_events.arc_title: Ethical Dilemmas And Moral Growth In Surgical Training
selected_events.content: Bailey warns Derek not to show favoritism toward Meredith due to their relationship, threatening to keep Meredith out of the OR if bias is observed.
selected_subtitles: Dr. Burke / Dr. Burke (PVM): Even great doctors make mistakes.
Dr. Burke / Dr. Burke OR Dr. Burke (PVM): And when we do, we've got to have a chance to be able to speak up without fear of retribution.
Dr. Burke / Dr. Burke (PVM): Or everyone suffers.

subtitles_sent_to_llm: 0: [00:38:26,623 - 00:38:33,570] Dr. Burke / Dr. Burke OR Dr. Burke (PVM): Five years ago, as a CT fellow, I had a nagging feeling that I didn't check the body cavity of a lung patient closely enough before I closed.
1: [00:38:34,271 - 00:38:36,735] Dr. Burke / Dr. Burke OR Dr. Burke (PVM): The patient seemed fine post-op, and I was in a hurry.
2: [00:38:39,097 - 00:38:43,282] Dr. Burke / Dr. Burke (PVM): And yesterday, you and Dr. Bailey pulled a towel out from under that patient's lung.
3: [00:38:44,222 - 00:38:46,846] Dr. Burke / Dr. Burke (PVM): Why didn't I report it at an appropriate time?
4: [00:38:46,905 - 00:38:54,454] Dr. Burke / Dr. Burke (PVM): Maybe because I was afraid that I would be called into a meeting where some hospital lawyer's fear of liability could end my career.
5: [00:38:55,750 - 00:38:57,271] Dr. Burke / Dr. Burke (PVM): Even great doctors make mistakes.
6: [00:38:57,552 - 00:39:02,260] Dr. Burke / Dr. Burke OR Dr. Burke (PVM): And when we do, we've got to have a chance to be able to speak up without fear of retribution.
7: [00:39:03,663 - 00:39:04,422] Dr. Burke / Dr. Burke (PVM): Or everyone suffers.
debug_info.status: SUCCESS - Used event 87bf0456-ab4a-4f62-a562-ca718f0dce81 for original event 10d2f939-18d6-4111-8566-ffda1771d055

selected_events.arc_title: The Roommates: Navigating Intimacy, Boundaries, And Growing Up
selected_events.content: The roommates support each other through personal and professional crises, such as worrying about Meredith's future in the program.

subtitles: 0: [00:32:01,942 - 00:32:03,943] Izzie / Dr. Izzie Stevens (PVM): Hey.
1: [00:32:03,963 - 00:32:04,045] Hank / Dr. Izzie Stevens (PVM): Hey.
2: [00:32:04,065 - 00:32:05,086] Hank / Dr. Izzie Stevens (PVM): What are you doing here?
3: [00:32:10,815 - 00:32:13,479] Dr. Izzie Stevens: I'm sorry I didn't have a chance to call.
4: [00:32:13,499 - 00:32:15,602] Dr. Izzie Stevens: My patient needed brain surgery.
5: [00:32:15,622 - 00:32:17,064] Dr. Izzie Stevens: Like we were inside his brain.
6: [00:32:17,084 - 00:32:17,846] Hank / Dr. Izzie Stevens (PVM): How cool is that?
7: [00:32:22,731 - 00:32:22,951] Addison Montgomery / Dr. Izzie Stevens (PVM): Oh, my God.
8: [00:32:22,971 - 00:32:25,497] Hank / Dr. Meredith Gray OR Dr. Izzie Stevens (PVM): There's a party at your house.
9: [00:32:25,695 - 00:32:27,077] Addison Montgomery / Dr. Izzie Stevens (PVM): Yeah, did you get a chance to hang out?
10: [00:32:27,318 - 00:32:28,961] Addison Montgomery / Dr. Izzie Stevens (PVM): Why don't you meet some of the people I work with?
11: [00:32:29,868 - 00:32:32,093] Hank / Dr. Meredith Gray (PVM): I don't care about the people you work with.
12: [00:32:32,113 - 00:32:32,873] Hank / Dr. Meredith Gray (PVM): I just want to see you.
13: [00:32:34,653 - 00:32:34,714] Addison Montgomery / Dr. Izzie Stevens (PVM): Hm.
14: [00:32:34,736 - 00:32:37,857] Addison Montgomery / Dr. Izzie Stevens OR Hank (PVM): Well, you didn't mind meeting the people I worked with when they were models.
15: [00:32:37,877 - 00:32:41,722] Hank / Hank (PVM): Yeah, well, when they were models, you actually showed up to your own parties.
16: [00:32:43,704 - 00:32:44,006] Addison Montgomery / Dr. Meredith Gray (PVM): Yeah.
17: [00:32:48,990 - 00:32:51,673] Dr. Addison Shepherd: This is my life now, Hank.
18: [00:32:51,693 - 00:32:52,855] Dr. Addison Shepherd: I work 100-hour weeks.
19: [00:32:53,737 - 00:32:57,902] Dr. Addison Shepherd: I can't always show up to my own parties on time, and my patients have to come first.
20: [00:32:58,102 - 00:33:03,028] Hank: Yeah, I just flew across the entire country, and there's a hundred people at your house.
21: [00:33:03,048 - 00:33:04,809] Dr. Addison Shepherd: Yeah, a hundred people will understand what I do all day.
22: [00:33:05,652 - 00:33:07,094] Dr. Addison Shepherd: I shouldn't have to apologize for that.
24: [00:33:16,865 - 00:33:19,650] Dr. Addison Shepherd: Look, let's just go by the party for a little while.
25: [00:33:19,710 - 00:33:25,317] Dr. Addison Shepherd: You'll really like everyone once you get a chance to know them.
27: [00:33:26,738 - 00:33:31,462] Dr. Addison Shepherd: Hank, come on.
subtitles_in_original_event: Cristina Yang / Dr. George O'Malley (PVM): When's your meeting with the chief?
Meredith Grey / Male Patient (PVM): In an hour.
Cristina Yang / Dr. Meredith Gray (PVM): Holy mother of destruction.
Cristina Yang / Dr. Meredith Gray (PVM): You missed Dr. Palooza.
Cristina Yang / Dr. Meredith Gray (PVM): Apparently, you didn't.
Alex Karev / Dr. Meredith Gray (PVM): I should probably never speak to you again.
Cristina Yang / Dr. Meredith Gray OR Dr. Izzie Stevens (PVM): I'm so sorry, Meredith.
Cristina Yang / Dr. Meredith Gray OR Dr. Izzie Stevens (PVM): I had no idea it was going to get so.
Dr. Meredith Gray: Really, I don't care.
Dr. Meredith Gray: What would I be doing anyway?
Cristina Yang / Dr. George O'Malley (PVM): Preparing for your career-altering meeting.
Cristina Yang / Dr. Meredith Gray OR Dr. George O'Malley (PVM): Sorry.
Dr. Meredith Gray: That heart wall shouldn't have torn.
Dr. Richard Webber / Dr. Meredith Gray (PVM): Anything in the patient's history?
